languages.text: "Милость примкнуть к Черному сердцу — величайшему из кабалов Комморры. Но только если они выследят и приведут последнего из рода бывшего архонта — последнего живого Эзирраеш. Твои бывшие воины исполнили свою роль — не без помощи ведьм Губительной жажды, но это не повод отказывать им в исполнительности".

traits.locale_text: "Милость примкнуть к Черному сердцу — величайшему из кабалов Комморры. Но только если они выследят и приведут последнего из рода бывшего архонта — той самой, что стала причиной новых бед для Комморры. Твои бывшие воины исполнили свою роль — не без помощи ведьм Выколотого глаза, но это не повод отказывать им в исполнительности".
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

languages.text: "I gave them the privilege of joining the Black Heart, the greatest Kabal of glorious Commorragh. But only if they tracked down and brought back the last surviving member of the former Archon's line, the last living Aezyrraesh. Your former warriors have done their part, though not without assistance from the Wyches of the Fatal Thirst. But that is no reason to deny them credit."
languages.original_text: "Милость примкнуть к Черному сердцу — величайшему из кабалов Комморры. Но только если они выследят и приведут последнего из рода бывшего архонта — последнего живого Эзирраеш. Твои бывшие воины исполнили свою роль — не без помощи ведьм Губительной жажды, но это не повод отказывать им в исполнительности".

traits.locale_text: "The grace to join the Black Heart, the greatest Kabal of the glorious Commorragh. But only if they track down and bring back the last surviving member of the former Archon's line, the last living Aezyrraesh. Your former warriors have done their part, though not without assistance from of the witches of the Gouged Eye. But this is no reason to deny them due diligence."
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

traits.locale_text: "The grace to join the Black Heart, the greatest Kabal of the glorious Commorragh. But only if they track down and bring back the last surviving member of the former Archon's line, the last living Aezyrraesh. Your former warriors have done their part, though not without assistance from of the witches of the Gouged Eye. But this is no reason to deny them due diligence."
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

traits.locale_text: "I gave them the privilege of joining the Black Heart, the greatest Kabal of glorious Commorragh. But only if they tracked down and brought back the last surviving member of the former Archon's line, the last living Aezyrraesh. Your former warriors have done their part, though not without assistance from the Wyches of the Fatal Thirst. But that is no reason to deny them credit."
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

traits.locale_text: "I gave them the privilege of joining the Black Heart, the greatest Kabal of glorious Commorragh. But only if they tracked down and brought back the last surviving member of the former Archon's line, the last living Aezyrraesh. Your former warriors have done their part, though not without assistance from the Wyches of the Fatal Thirst. But that is no reason to deny them credit."
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

traits.locale_text: "I gave them the privilege of joining the Black Heart, the greatest Kabal of glorious Commorragh. But only if they tracked down and brought back the last surviving member of the former Archon's line, the last living Aezyrraesh. Your former warriors have done their part, though not without assistance from the Wyches of the Fatal Thirst. But that is no reason to deny them credit."
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

languages.text: "Ich habe ihnen das Privileg gegeben, dem Schwarzen Herzen beizutreten, der größten Kabale des glorreichen Commorragh. Doch nur, wenn sie das letzte überlebende Mitglied der Linie des ehemaligen Archonten aufspüren und zu mir bringen, den letzten lebenden Aezyrraesh. Eure ehemaligen Krieger haben ihren Beitrag geleistet, wenn auch nicht ohne die Unterstützung der Hekatari des Fatalen Dursts. Doch das ist kein Grund, ihnen den Lohn zu verwehren."
languages.original_text: "I gave them the privilege of joining the Black Heart, the greatest Kabal of glorious Commorragh. But only if they tracked down and brought back the last surviving member of the former Archon's line, the last living Aezyrraesh. Your former warriors have done their part, though not without assistance from the Wyches of the Fatal Thirst. But that is no reason to deny them credit."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe ihnen das Privileg gegeben, dem Schwarzen Herzen beizutreten, der größten Kabale des glorreichen Commorragh. Doch nur, wenn sie das letzte überlebende Mitglied der Linie des ehemaligen Archonten aufspüren und zu mir bringen, den letzten lebenden Aezyrraesh. Eure ehemaligen Krieger haben ihren Beitrag geleistet, wenn auch nicht ohne die Unterstützung der Hekatari des Fatalen Dursts. Doch das ist kein Grund, ihnen den Lohn zu verwehren."
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

languages.text: “我允许他们加入科摩罗最伟大的阴谋团——黑心阴谋团，但前提是，他们必须找到艾泽拉什家族最后的成员，把他活着带到我面前。你曾经的战士们已经完成了他们的任务。尽管致命饥渴教派的巫灵在这件事上也帮了忙，但那些战士依然功不可没。”
languages.original_text: "I gave them the privilege of joining the Black Heart, the greatest Kabal of glorious Commorragh. But only if they tracked down and brought back the last surviving member of the former Archon's line, the last living Aezyrraesh. Your former warriors have done their part, though not without assistance from the Wyches of the Fatal Thirst. But that is no reason to deny them credit."

traits.locale_text: “我允许他们加入科摩罗最伟大的阴谋团——黑心阴谋团，但前提是，他们必须找到艾泽拉什家族最后的成员，把他活着带到我面前。你曾经的战士们已经完成了他们的任务。尽管致命饥渴教派的巫灵在这件事上也帮了忙，但那些战士依然功不可没。”
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

languages.text: « Je leur ai offert le privilège de rejoindre le Cœur Noir, la plus prestigieuse Kabale de la glorieuse Commorragh. Mais à une condition : qu'ils me ramènent le dernier membre de la lignée de l'ancien archonte, le seul Aezyrraesh encore vivant. Vos anciens guerriers ont rempli leur mission, non sans l'aide des Cérastes de la Soif Fatale, certes. Mais cela ne signifie pas qu'ils sont sans mérite. »
languages.original_text: "I gave them the privilege of joining the Black Heart, the greatest Kabal of glorious Commorragh. But only if they tracked down and brought back the last surviving member of the former Archon's line, the last living Aezyrraesh. Your former warriors have done their part, though not without assistance from the Wyches of the Fatal Thirst. But that is no reason to deny them credit."

traits.locale_text: « Je leur ai offert le privilège de rejoindre le Cœur Noir, la plus prestigieuse Kabale de la glorieuse Commorragh. Mais à une condition : qu'ils me ramènent le dernier membre de la lignée de l'ancien archonte, le seul Aezyrraesh encore vivant. Vos anciens guerriers ont rempli leur mission, non sans l'aide des Cérastes de la Soif Fatale, certes. Mais cela ne signifie pas qu'ils sont sans mérite. »
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

languages.text: «Les di el privilegio de unirse al Corazón Negro, la mayor Kábala de la gloriosa Commorragh. Pero solo si encontraban y traían al último superviviente del linaje de su anterior Arconte, el último Aezyrraesh vivo. Tus antiguos guerreros han cumplido su parte. Aunque hayan tenido ayuda de las brujas de la Sed Letal, eso no es motivo para negarles el mérito».
languages.original_text: "I gave them the privilege of joining the Black Heart, the greatest Kabal of glorious Commorragh. But only if they tracked down and brought back the last surviving member of the former Archon's line, the last living Aezyrraesh. Your former warriors have done their part, though not without assistance from the Wyches of the Fatal Thirst. But that is no reason to deny them credit."

traits.locale_text: «Les di el privilegio de unirse al Corazón Negro, la mayor Kábala de la gloriosa Commorragh. Pero solo si encontraban y traían al último superviviente del linaje de su anterior Arconte, el último Aezyrraesh vivo. Tus antiguos guerreros han cumplido su parte. Aunque hayan tenido ayuda de las brujas de la Sed Letal, eso no es motivo para negarles el mérito».
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

languages.text: 「私は輝かしいコモラフの最も素晴らしい陰謀団である〈黒き心臓〉へ加わる権利を彼らに与えた。だが前のアーコンの一族の最後のメンバー、最後のアエジレシュを見つけ出して連れてくることができればだ。“宿命の渇き”のウィッチの助けなしにとはいかなかったが、君の以前の戦士たちは役割を果たしてくれた。だからといって彼らに報酬を与えないわけにはいかないが」
languages.original_text: "I gave them the privilege of joining the Black Heart, the greatest Kabal of glorious Commorragh. But only if they tracked down and brought back the last surviving member of the former Archon's line, the last living Aezyrraesh. Your former warriors have done their part, though not without assistance from the Wyches of the Fatal Thirst. But that is no reason to deny them credit."

traits.locale_text: 「私は輝かしいコモラフの最も素晴らしい陰謀団である〈黒き心臓〉へ加わる権利を彼らに与えた。だが前のアーコンの一族の最後のメンバー、最後のアエジレシュを見つけ出して連れてくることができればだ。“宿命の渇き”のウィッチの助けなしにとはいかなかったが、君の以前の戦士たちは役割を果たしてくれた。だからといって彼らに報酬を与えないわけにはいかないが」
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

languages.text: "Onlara Kara Yürek'e, Commorragh'ın en yüce Kabal'ına katılma ayrıcalığını tanıdım. Tek yapmaları gereken; eski Arkon'un soyundan geriye kalan son kişiyi, yaşayan son Aezyrraesh'i bulup getirmekti. Eski savaşçıların, üstlerine düşeni yaptı. Ölüme Susamışlığın Viçleri'nin de yardımını aldılar ama bu, haklarını teslim etmemem için bir sebep değil."
languages.original_text: "I gave them the privilege of joining the Black Heart, the greatest Kabal of glorious Commorragh. But only if they tracked down and brought back the last surviving member of the former Archon's line, the last living Aezyrraesh. Your former warriors have done their part, though not without assistance from the Wyches of the Fatal Thirst. But that is no reason to deny them credit."

traits.locale_text: "Onlara Kara Yürek'e, Commorragh'ın en yüce Kabal'ına katılma ayrıcalığını tanıdım. Tek yapmaları gereken eski Arkon'un soyundan geriye son kalan kişiyi, son yaşayan Aezyrraesh'i bulup geri getirmekti. Eski savaşçıların üzerilerine düşeni yaptı. Ölüme Susamışlığın Viçlerinin de yardımını aldılar ama bu, haklarını teslim etmemem için bir sebep değil."
traits.speaker: Nazrakey
